Rulings.Base: 1. You can Normal Summon this monster with 2 Tributes as well.\n2. "You can Normal Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Gravekeeper's" monster" is not an effect.\n3. If a "Gravekeeper's" monster is discarded to prevent this monster from being destroyed by battle, you perform damage calculation with the ATK of "Gravekeeper's Visionary" without applying the extra 200 ATK.

PSCT.Base: You can Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Gravekeeper's" monster. This card gains 200 ATK for each "Gravekeeper's" monster in your Graveyard. If this face-up card would be destroyed, you can discard 1 "Gravekeeper's" monster instead.
